author: Ben Kesslen
title: At least 33 dead as dozens of tornadoes rip through the South
description: At least 33 people were killed on Easter Sunday and Monday after tornadoes ripped through Arkansas, Mississippi, Texas, Tennessee, Louisiana and Georgia.
content:
At least 33 people were killed after tornadoes began ripping through the South on Easter Sunday, destroying homes and storefronts and leaving over 1 million people without power from an intense storm system now headed toward the mid-Atlantic.
